game.name: Deep Space Cache
game.shortDescription: Deep Space Cache는 짧고 간단한 bullet heaven 게임으로 incremental 소행성 채굴을 포함합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Deep Space Cache is a short & simple semi-idle bullet heaven incremental asteroid miner game.

reviewHighlights.text: Fun and simple game, ends just in time to not get too stale
I wouldn't advise this even for free. There is no incentive to do anything. No incentive to use a strategy. No incentive to even read the things you i...
